response.overview: Mark Kaminsky is kicked out of the FBI for his rough treatment of a suspect. He winds up as the sheriff of a small town in North Carolina. FBI Chief Harry Shannon, whose son has been killed by a mobster named Patrovina, enlists Kaminsky in a personal vendetta with a promise of reinstatement into the FBI if Patrovina is taken down. To accomplish this, he must go undercover and join Patrovina's gang.
response.tagline: The system gave him a raw deal. Nobody gives him a raw deal.
response.title: Raw Deal

cast.name: Peter Kent
cast.character: Thug shot dead onto garbage cans at rock quarry (uncredited)
